title: League of legends rip off?
body:
This is a pretty common thing Ive noticed, games stealing the concept of some of the themes/characters in LoL, but this pop up ad game went all the way and stole the Snowstorm Sivir skin and put it in their advertisement. Personally I just think this is unfair and think riot should do something about it. Is this the best way to notify Riot of this matter?

These games are also terrible too boot.



The ad for the game is in the link posted

Cheer,

replies.body:
>#1 Game

Est Numero Uno.

Best thing to do about this is to send in a support ticket telling them. They probably won't do anything about it, though, considering this is a free to play game.
